As an AI language model, I do not have access to the specific experiments and projects carried out by GONZO. However, it is not uncommon for companies to experiment with these technology trends in order to innovate and improve their products and services.

For example, GONZO may have already experimented with AI and machine learning to improve their data analysis capabilities and enhance user experience. They may have also explored virtual and augmented reality technologies to provide an immersive experience for their users. Furthermore, GONZO may have invested in cloud computing and blockchain technologies to improve security and data management.

Again, without insider knowledge of GONZO's operations, it is impossible to know exactly which technologies they have experimented with or implemented. However, it is likely that they have explored some of these technology trends as a means of staying competitive and keeping up with industry advancements.
